about.title: About Us

benefits.title: Benefits of table tennis
benefits.lead: A low-impact activity with high returns for physical, cognitive, and social health.
benefits.physicalDesc: Hand-eye coordination, balance, agility, and functional strength with low joint impact.
benefits.cognitiveDesc: Trains memory, focus, and quick decision-making in safe environments.
benefits.cardiovascularDesc: Moderate aerobic activity that supports heart health and endurance.
benefits.socialDesc: Builds community, reduces isolation, and fosters healthy habits.

about.description: The Club Esportiu Joventut TT was founded in Sant Josep de sa Talaia with a clear mission: to improve health, well-being, and social cohesion through sport. We are a young and inclusive club, and we travel anywhere in Ibiza to offer activities adapted to each center or collaborating entity.
about.excellenceDesc: We strive to provide the highest quality in all our training and activities.
about.communityDesc: We foster an environment where members support each other and grow together.
about.growthDesc: We promote personal and sporting development at each person’s pace.
about.mission: Promote table tennis as a tool for health, integration and personal development, reaching all sectors of society.
about.vision: To be a benchmark club at regional and national levels, recognized for its sporting, educational and social impact.
about.valuesLead: We believe in sport as a vehicle for values and in the power of community to grow together.
about.valuesDesc: The principles that guide our work and understanding of sport.

values.inclusionDesc: An environment where everyone, regardless of age or ability, finds their place in table tennis.
values.integrationDesc: A meeting space for learning and mutual support for youth, adults and families.
values.developmentDesc: Personal and sporting development with methods tailored to every stage.

about.teamIntro: Behind Club Esportiu Joventut are passionate people who make every training, project and achievement possible.
about.coachDesc: With a solid background in table tennis, Adrián combines experience, training and passion for teaching. He drives our sports project, guiding young talents and veteran players to their full potential.

trainings.title: Training Programs
trainings.description: Discover the training program that best fits your level and availability. At Club Esportiu Joventut TT in Sant Josep de sa Talaia we offer 1.5-hour table tennis sessions designed to improve technique, fitness and game confidence. Choose your plan and enjoy motivating, inclusive and effective training.

trainings.youthMore: Solid technical fundamentals, coordination and agility through games and circuits, sports habits and goal-based tracking.

trainings.corporateMore: Team dynamics to improve communication and cooperation. Inclusive, fun activities. Custom packages at your site or at our club.
